stories.Title: Introducing: Copenhagen Atomics
stories.Description: The company is on a mission to simplify the transition to nuclear power with its compact, thorium-based molten salt reactor.
stories.Tweet: Introducing: Copenhagen Atomics 📦 The company is on a mission to simplify the transition to nuclear power with its compact, thorium-based molten salt reactor. #science https://www.copenhagenatomics.com/

stories.Title: A great sight of Mercury
stories.Description: Europe's BepiColombo probe is set to have its third flyby of Mercury today, zooming past at an incredibly close distance of 147 miles.
stories.Tweet: A great sight of Mercury 📦 Europe's BepiColombo probe is set to have its third flyby of Mercury today, zooming past at an incredibly close distance of 147 miles. #ESA https://www.space.com/mercury-flyby-bepicolombo-spacecraft-june-2023

stories.Title: Decoding the Sun's mysteries
stories.Description: New discoveries from NASA's Parker Solar Probe redefine our understanding of the region where the solar wind emerges. With detailed insights into the processes and mechanisms at play.
stories.Tweet: Decoding the Sun's mysteries 📦 New discoveries from NASA's Parker Solar Probe redefine our understanding of the region where the solar wind emerges. With detailed insights into the processes and mechanisms at play. #science https://arstechnica.com/science/2023/06/parker-solar-probe-images-the-launch-of-the-solar-wind/

stories.Title: Tesla's winter wonderland
stories.Description: The Cybertruck's epic journey takes a snowy turn in New Zealand as it undergoes winter testing, fueling the anticipation for its upcoming deliveries.
stories.Tweet: Tesla's winter wonderland 📦 The Cybertruck's epic journey takes a snowy turn in New Zealand as it undergoes winter testing, fueling the anticipation for its upcoming deliveries. #tesla https://electrek.co/2023/06/18/tesla-cybertruck-lands-new-zealand-final-winter-testing/

stories.Title: Total synchrony across Apple's ecosystem
stories.Description: Analyst Ming-Chi Kuo sheds light on Apple's plan to enhance the iPhone 15's hardware specifications, ensuring seamless integration with the revolutionary Vision Pro.

stories.Title: Meta unveils Voicebox
stories.Description: Their advanced AI model breaks down language barriers by generating speech from text, while effortlessly performing tasks like editing, noise removal, and style transfer.
stories.Tweet: Meta unveils Voicebox 📦 Their advanced AI model breaks down language barriers by generating speech from text, while effortlessly performing tasks like editing, noise removal, and style transfer.  #meta https://venturebeat.com/ai/meta-announces-voicebox-a-generative-model-for-multiple-voice-synthesis-tasks/

stories.Title: Meta's brain drain
stories.Description: With a third of its AI researchers leaving due to burnout or lack of faith, the company struggles to keep up with competitors like OpenAI.
stories.Tweet: Meta's brain drain 📦 With a third of its AI researchers leaving due to burnout or lack of faith, the company struggles to keep up with competitors like OpenAI. #meta https://www.businessinsider.com/meta-ai-researchers-leave-trying-to-catch-up-openai-innovators-2023-6

stories.Title: AI is not taking home a Grammy
stories.Description: As music embraces technological advancements, the Grammy Awards reaffirm the significance of human artistry by setting new rules for AI-generated elements.
stories.Tweet: AI is not taking home a Grammy 📦 As music embraces technological advancements, the Grammy Awards reaffirm the significance of human artistry by setting new rules for AI-generated elements. #ai https://www.npr.org/2023/06/18/1183013852/grammys-ai-music-awards

stories.Title: Olvy is all about productivity
stories.Description: Meet your ultimate feedback solution: this AI-powered platform ingests and analyzes all your feedback, providing simple, easy-to-read insights.

stories.Title: It’s okay, leave it to AI
stories.Description: Don't fear the rise of AI in the workplace; instead, embrace it as it continues to revolutionize the way we work, opening doors to new possibilities and efficiency.

stories.Title: The rocket launch is out of the bag
